pp2.6:1.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:1.1_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ,
pp2.6:2.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:2.1_1: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ,
pp2.6:3.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:4.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:5.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:5.1_1: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti,
pp2.6:6.1_0: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
pp2.6:6.1_1: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti,
